alert.note: Alert for Steuben (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 05 at 1:47PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Steuben County through 215 PM EDT... At 147 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Haskinville, or 9 miles northeast of Hornell, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Howard, Wheeler, Avoca, Cohocton, Haskinville and Kanona. This includes the following highway exits... Interstate 86/Route 17 between 35 and 37. Interstate 390 between 1 and 2. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Heavy rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
